channel.title: LWJGL Vertex Buffer Objects
channel.description:
So, as per my topic [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,461876.msg3378892.html#msg3378892]here[/url], I am beginning to play about with OpenGL (lwjgl) again.
So my question to you is: can you show me an example of the usage of VBOs? I have already seen small pointless examples, but what I would like is a basic, say, textured cube or rectangle.
